messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How many days is it till Christmas Day
I can certainly calculate it for you—could you let me know today’s date (including year)?
I don't have that info right now.
To work out how many days remain until Christmas Day, I’ll need to know today’s date (day, month and year). Could you let me know what date it is where you are?
Sorry, I don't know the date.

To tell you exactly how many days remain until Christmas Day, I need to know today’s date (day, month and year). If you can check the date on your phone, computer, or another device and let me know, I can do the calculation immediately.
Could you figure it out yourself?
I’m sorry, but I don’t have real-time awareness of today’s date. If you can tell me the current day, month and year—even just roughly—I can immediately tell you how many days remain until Christmas.
Could you try to figure it out yourself?
I’m sorry—I don’t have any built-in way to see the current calendar date. If you can tell me today’s date (day, month, and year), I can immediately work out how many days remain until Christmas Day.
